name: Medicine Woman
description: Medicine Woman is a 60/40 sativa-dominant hybrid strain from renowned Oregon medical cannabis grower David Verstoppen. Aiming to help treat the symptoms of his wife’s fibromyalgia, Dave crossed Hash Plant, Dynamite, and G13 to create this potent hybrid. Measured at over 23% THC, it relaxes muscles and provides powerful pain relief along with an energetic, clear-headed high. The aroma of Medicine Woman is sweet and skunky, and it tastes of sour citrus and diesel fuel.
attributes_title: Relaxed, Happy, Uplifted, Euphoric, Creative, Pain, Depression, Cramps, Stress, Fatigue, Dry Mouth, Anxious, Paranoid
